question: Which quarter demonstrates the strongest business performance based on the stacked area chart?

options.A: Q4 shows the strongest performance with the highest total area.
options.B: Q2 shows the strongest performance with balanced metrics.
options.C: The chart cannot determine overall performance because it combines unrelated business metrics.
options.D: Q4 shows the strongest performance with the highest employee count.

explanation: The chart stacks unrelated business metrics (product sales, office temperature, employee count) into a cumulative area. These metrics cannot be meaningfully combined to assess overall performance. Only individual metric analysis is valid.
